edu.cuny.prng
Class GlobalPRNG

java.lang.Object
  edu.cuny.prng.GlobalPRNG

public class GlobalPRNG
extends java.lang.Object

A facility providing random number generators.

It maintains a default generator, whose seed may be specified in a parameter file for the application or dynamically determined by the current system time. Depending upon the mode of the application, the single default generator may be used for all random number generation, or multiple generators are created, each for different modules of the application. The seeds for these generators are otherwise from an internal seed generator. Whether using the single generator or multiple ones can be controlled by the usemultiengine parameter.

Parameters

base.prng
class, implements PRNGFactory interface		 random number generator factory implementation class
base .seed
double > 0		 (the seed for the default random number generator)
base .usemultiengine
boolean (true by default)		 (use multiple random number generators or not)

Default Base

prng

Version:
$Revision: 1.14 $

Steve Phelps

getEngine

public cern.jet.random.engine.RandomEngine getEngine()
obtains a random number generator.

Returns:
a new generator, if useMultiEngine is true, or the default generator that is shared by everyone otherwise.

getDefaultEngine

public cern.jet.random.engine.RandomEngine getDefaultEngine()
gets the default random number generator, which can be shared by different components in a single-threading application; otherwise { getEngine() should be used to create a generator for each thread for safety.

Returns:
the default random number generator

useMultiEngine - true if a new engine should be created; false otherwise.
